title: RANKED IS BROKEN
body: Riot you need to change ranked this is ridiculous. I've been stuck in bronze 5 for months now and i cant get out. I carry my team to promos. Then when i get to promos everyone feeds but me. I'm not the only one stuck in this situation and its very frustrating. I know you give the players a free win but its still not enough. In Bronze five i'm lucky to get a win because of idiots i have to play with. Check my match history please just fix this monstrosity

replies.body: You want Riot to fix the players who play the game? How so? Please tell me I'm interested to know

I dont want Riot to change the players but i think there is a better way to be enable players to rank up. I finished my 10 promo games in bronze IV, now I respect that because i did terrible in my promos. But since im in bronze its impossible for me to rank up. 
Reason 1: At least mid or bot lane always feeds.
Reason 2: People in bronze don't listen
Reason 3: They tilt by 5 mins
I think that if a player reaches their promos more than twice (for the same rank) the third time should automatically let them rank up, because i believe thats enough proof that the certain player is good enough rank up. What do you think about this?

Well u already get a free promo win if you have reached the promos before. Free rank up is a crap idea.

Mate you probably joined ranked to early if you got put in bronze 4 as i did. I went 0-22 at the start and couldn't even get lp. I am currently in the same position as you. I got out to b4 but then tilted back and have lost promos twice. Just use it as motivation to improve and look at your own game.

Yeah i agree, i placed S3 on this last year after playing since season 3 and doing terrible in bronze on another account.... i played all the champs at least once in normals, found my main bud and made a new account, carried myself and my team through my promos and bam! now ive climbed my main account from b5-2 in 2 weeks haha :)

You should Main mid/jungle if you want to climb. I like shyvana because her mid game is really scary. If you get sated devourer + titanic + swifties by 20 minutes its pretty much gg. The problem with shyvana is you hardly gank pre-6 and even at 6 you only want to gank if it seems like a 90% kill rate and a 1% chance of you dying. If you try to gank and fail too much you wont be able to get titanic and you wont be sated, then when the enemy is seiging you wont be able to farm as much or you end up losing inhibs...

Course if you manage to get kills AND farm the jungle lots, the game becomes a curb stomp.


I also main akali mid, i like her she just sticks to people like super glue (especially once you get gunblade + rylais) and the way i built her she has just as much sustain as vladimir early game.

Can't tell if trolling or actually serious.
In case you're serious though, if you're able to consistently do better than your teammates, you will eventually climb. Being as good as your enemy or teammates isn't good enough if you wanna climb, you have to prove yourself to be good enough that you can carry them despite them doing badly etc.
One of the most common issues with pele in lower elo is that they think they're playing well and aren't making mistakes themselves, letting them only see other players' mistakes. If you're think you deserve to be placed higher, you need to win not only your lane consistently but also carry other lanes, at least most of the time.
if you want to get out of bronze, play carry champ, not support

> [{quoted}](name=Manly1,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ZXxlpJAx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-04T23:48:21.146+0000)
>
> wood division?

Worse than bronze level.

If you truly think you're playing at a higher standard than your rank, you could always attempt to find several other players you synergise well with and rank with them.
The only real advice for team incompetence is to remove them from the equation.

The beauty of Dynamic queue isn't people getting boosted, it's people getting out of ELO hell because they can finally coordinate with a team and play to their full mechanical skill level, ~~without the monkey wrench wildcard's you get in SoloQ who are in Bronze V for a reason~~.

If you truly shouldn't be in Bronze 5, you would've been placed higher after your ten games at the start of the season.
Otherwise, main Jungle and make sure your mid and bot are fed, not feeding.
